title: For the Love of Caden
description: Book SixThis book is part of a series.Caden Fournier has everything: Money, fame and an international business that's skyrocketing. But the one thing he really wants, money can't buy: Love. When fate puts him in the path of a speeding semi, Caden meets handsome paramedic Kellan Brady. Kellan Brady has been waiting for his mate for as long as he can remember. Always wanting the fairy tale of true love, he ends up instead with an injured and angry Frenchman pinned in his BMW.If they can get past their rocky start, can the two men build a relationship when both are hiding a secret?Warning: Men making love and plenty of curse words.Sneak Peek at book Seven follows...
author: Sandrine Gasq-Dion
